::Zardus::

Zardus frowns, thinking over Unitron's words as he led the new recruits to 
their quarters. The defences were watching them carefully, but Unitron was 
right, it would not be a good idea to trust them with anything important. 
Zardus silently chuckles to himself. He didn't trust anyone too much. That 
was why all the Alliance base's functions had a direct link to his wrist 
computer, so he could keep watch and regulate any trouble back at the base.

He stops by a set of doors. "This one is yours, Hot Rod," he says to Hot Rod, 
pushing a button to make a door slide aside, revealing the typical Alliance 
quarters. He turns to the door across the hall, opening it as well, 
"Cybershark, this one is yours."

The rooms were about the same size, and had furnishings from Reptilica's and 
Bloodystrike's old base (Hot Rod and Cybershark, you guys can design them as 
you wish).

"You can make yourself at home or explore the base. But be carefull, the 
defences are watching you. Any weaponfire or sudden cloaking will result in 
lockdown in the area, and injury or death. If you have any questions, contact 
me."

Zardus turns to Feline. "I believe you have information for me... Come."

He turns around, walking off toward the CR chambers.
